ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:13}); // {Cloud}
“Looks like I'm
a little late.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:28}); // {Cloud}
“It bugs me when you thank me.
It's just a part of my job.”
fade({r:255, g:0, b:0, speed:1, type:2, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:1, type:4, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:255, type:2, adjust:0});

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:6}); // {Barret}
“How the hell would I know!?
Do I look like a mind reader?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:14}); // {Barret}
“You damn right, you're late!!”{PAUSE}“Come waltzin' in here
makin' a big scene!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:16}); // {Barret}
“(*^%!”{PAUSE}“Havin' everyone worried like that.
You don't give a damn 'bout
no one but yourself!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:18}); // {Barret}
“Wha!?”{PAUSE}“That's comin' outta
your share, hot shot! ”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:19}); // {Barret}
“Wake up!”{PAUSE}“We're movin' out!
Follow me!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:2}); // Biggs
“{Cloud}…
Think he was killed?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:5}); // Biggs
“Say, do you think {Cloud}'s…”{PAUSE}“going to stay on and fight
for AVALANCHE!?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:21}); // Biggs
“Heh heh…{Cloud}!
We'll do even better next time.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:8}); // Wedge
“Hey, {Barret}!
What about our money?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:20}); // Wedge
“Hey, {Cloud}!!
You were great back there!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:22}); // Jessie
“Careful,
I'll shut this.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:23}); // Jessie
“Oh, {Cloud}!!
Your face is pitch-black…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:25}); // Jessie
“Say, thanks for helping me
back there at the reactor!”

dialogStrings:
Biggs
“Say, do you think {Cloud}'s…”{PAUSE}“going to stay on and fight
for AVALANCHE!?”

{Barret}
“How the hell would I know!?
Do I look like a mind reader?”

{Barret}
“You damn right, you're late!!”{PAUSE}“Come waltzin' in here
makin' a big scene!”

{Cloud}
“It's no big scene.
Just what I always do.”

{Barret}
“(*^%!”{PAUSE}“Havin' everyone worried like that.
You don't give a damn 'bout
no one but yourself!”

{Barret}
“Wha!?”{PAUSE}“That's comin' outta
your share, hot shot! ”

Wedge
“Hey, {Cloud}!!
You were great back there!”

Biggs
“Heh heh…{Cloud}!
We'll do even better next time.”

Jessie
“Say, thanks for helping me
back there at the reactor!”

{Cloud}
“It bugs me when you thank me.
It's just a part of my job.”

Jessie
“But, I…
I was just glad…”
Shut-off the switch in this position.

We can escape from the train event…
Did it!!
4th failure
3rd failure
2nd failure
1st failure
Escaped
